'''Material Share Bundle''' is available as part of the [[Adventurer's Share Bundle]] in quantities of 12, which can be purchased in the [[Gift Shop]] section in the [[Shop]] once per week for {{Item|Genesis Crystal|30|x=60}}.

One of the following can be selected upon using this item:
{{Card|Tile of Decarabian's Tower|1}}{{Card|Boreal Wolf's Milk Tooth|1}}{{Card|Fetters of the Dandelion Gladiator|1}}{{Card|Luminous Sands from Guyun|1}}{{Card|Mist Veiled Lead Elixir|1}}{{Card|Grain of Aerosiderite|1}}{{Card|Coral Branch of a Distant Sea|1}}{{Card|Narukami's Wisdom|1}}{{Card|Mask of the Wicked Lieutenant|1}}
